description: An area is a physical, geographical, or logical grouping determined by the site. It may contain work centers such as process cells, production units, production lines, and storage zones. Most Level 3 functions occur within the area. The main production capability and geographical location within a site usually identify areas.
title: Area
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.01-2010 (IEC 62264-1 Mod) Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 1: Models and Terminology - Approved 13 May 2010

links.dtdl:description: Reference to a contained work center of the area
links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the ISA-95 Standard. Just to make the graph easier to handle
